channel.title: idyl
channel.description: idyl | Fine diamond jewelry for everyday wear. Modular jewelry collection: Mix & match your diamonds. Fueled by transparency: Sustainable lab-grown diamonds & Conflict-free Solid gold. Free shipping & returns.

item.title: Ada - Yellow Gold
item.description: Ada is a halo of the sparkliest lab grown diamonds, encircling an even bigger 0.15 cts stone for big timeless glow. Ada is the perfect match for the Amelia earrings.

item.title: Ada - White Gold
item.description: Ada is a halo of the sparkliest lab grown diamonds, encircling an even bigger 0.15 cts stone for big timeless glow. Ada is the perfect match for the Amelia earrings.

item.title: Ada - Rose Gold
item.description: Ada is a halo of the sparkliest lab grown diamonds, encircling an even bigger 0.15 cts stone for big timeless glow. Ada is the perfect match for the Amelia earrings.

item.title: Adele - Yellow Gold / Left
item.description: Adele features three graduating bezel-set oval diamonds (0.05ct, 0.10ct, and 0.15ct) totaling 0.30TCW that dance gracefully on delicate chains suspended from a curved gold bar. Perfect for those who love movement and exceptional sparkle. Style with the Elise necklace for effortless layering.

item.description: Adele features three graduating bezel-set oval diamonds (0.05ct, 0.10ct, and 0.15ct) totaling 0.30TCW that dance gracefully on delicate chains suspended from a curved gold bar. item.title: Amara - Yellow Gold
item.description: Amara captivates with three coveted diamond cuts: a 0.15ct marquise, 0.20ct emerald, and 0.15ct pear. Beautifully slanted and bezel-set for that perfect 70's-inspired edge. This exceptional piece elevates any look and draws every eye. Stunning when paired with Tali.

item.title: Amara - White Gold
item.description: Amara captivates with three coveted diamond cuts: a 0.15ct marquise, 0.20ct emerald, and 0.15ct pear. Beautifully slanted and bezel-set for that perfect 70's-inspired edge. This exceptional piece elevates any look and draws every eye. Stunning when paired with Tali.

item.title: Amelia - Yellow Gold
item.description: Amelia is a timelessly elegant diamond halo earring, set in 14k gold. Sparkly lab grown diamonds that circle all the way around your modular stud ensure a classic look that will never go out of style.

item.title: Amelia - White Gold
item.description: Amelia is a timelessly elegant diamond halo earring, set in 14k gold. Sparkly lab grown diamonds that circle all the way around your modular stud ensure a classic look that will never go out of style.

item.title: Ami - Yellow Gold
item.description: Named for friendship, this elegant 0.50ct Oval-cut Diamond suspends a delicate 0.15ct Pear, creating effortless movement. Classic pairing that transforms your hoop into something deeply personal. The rhythm of shapes feels as natural as conversation. Each diamond is hand-selected from the finest 1% of Lab-Grown Diamonds and lovingly handcrafted at the idyl atelier. Set in beautiful Georgian style cut-down settings in 14K Solid Gold — a quality you can feel in every facet and finish.

item.title: Ami - White Gold
item.description: Named for friendship, this elegant 0.50ct Oval-cut Diamond suspends a delicate 0.15ct Pear, creating effortless movement. Each diamond is hand-selected from the finest 1% of Lab-Grown Diamonds and lovingly handcrafted at the idyl atelier.
